SELECT o.id as id, customer_id, shop_id, order_sn, pid, consignee, region_id, address, mobile, message, order_type, freight_price, coupon_id, o.coupon_activity_id as coupon_activity_id, discount_price, origin_price, presale_id, groupon_discount, rebate_num, confirm_time, shipment_sn, `state`, substate, be_deleted, o.gmt_create as gmt_create, o.gmt_modified as gmt_modified, groupon_id, i.id as orderItem_id, order_id, goods_sku_id, quantity, price, discount, name, i.coupon_activity_id as orderItem_coupon_activity_id, be_share_id, i.gmt_create as orderItem_gmt_create, i.gmt_modified as orderItem_gmt_modified FROM orders o LEFT JOIN order_item i ON o.id = i.order_id WHERE o.id = #{id}
